mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( paymentId, orderId, pgTid, paymentMethod, amount, buyerName, buyerId, buyerEmail, buyerTel, status, failReason, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{paymentId}, #{orderId}, #{pgTid}, #{paymentMethod}, #{amount}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerId}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerTel}, #{status}, #{failReason}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: select CREATEDAT, BUYERNAME, AMOUNT, PAYMENTMETHOD, ORDERID, PAYMENTID from payment where BUYERID=#{BUYERID} AND STATUS='성공' order by CREATEDAT desc
